creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: brown woven fabric with woven silk on top half across the shoulder and down in the center part way; patterns in various colors with a dark purple background--various patterns; edges are not attached together; panels stitched together with green thread; two ties at one shoulder by neckline to tie together; a fabric flower on each side of the neckline
title: Huipil
